tool_description: Retrieves current balance and basic account information for cryptocurrency addresses across multiple blockchain networks using public APIs.

address.description: Cryptocurrency address to check balance for

blockchain_type.description: Blockchain network: bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash

error_messages: Invalid address format: Address format is not valid for the specified blockchain.

usage: Provide address and blockchain_type to retrieve current balance. Set include_tokens to true for ERC-20 token balances on Ethereum.

balance.description: Current balance in native currency units

transaction_count.description: Total number of transactions for this address

tokens.description: Array of token balances (if requested and applicable)
